Translations.Text: A neckeo Oebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan. Irra tillas, tafat. Sinna, wid ijehlen pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen
Neppa, ikwen Ixelqen s talaxt, sinna, Iseyya lajel. £uoeS lajel ipwassnen. Deffir waya, kunwi la tepcukkum
Neppa, d Oebbi deg igenwan, di tmurt. Issen sser nnwen, d wayen d teqqaoem. Ieoa ayen tkesbem
Ur ten id ippas ussekni seg issekniyen n Mass nnsen, mebla ma ugin t
Ni$ skaddben tidep, mi ten id tusa. A ten id ias usali n wayen i$ef ttihin

Day ur walan ara aceal isuta, uqbel nnsen, ay Nekkes. Nesserked iten di tmurt akken ur kwen Nesserked. Nuzen asen aias ugeffur, Nerra yasen isaffen, ppazzalen seddawat sen. Nesnegr iten ilmend ibekkaven nnsen. Nxelq ed, deffir sen, sself nniven
Xas ad ak ed Nessers Tazmamt, di lka$ev, ara nnalen s ifassen nnsen, war ccekk, a d inin wid ijehlen: "wagi, s tidep, siwa sseur n uuee
Qqaoen: "a lemmer id irs $uoes lmelk". Lemmer a n Nessers lmelk, war ccekk, ad iuao lameo, sinna, ur pganin
Lemmer i t Nerri d lmelk, yili Nerra t d argaz, ad as Nessels ayen plusun
Ni$ mmaalken $ef imazanen, uqbel ik. Ayen i$ef ttihin, izzi i wid, segsen, immaalken
Ini: "ddut di tmurt, sinna walit amek tevoa d wid iskiddiben
Ini: "w i t ilan wayen akw illan di tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Oebbi". Iura, deg iman iS, aeunu. A kwen Issemlil i wass n tnekra, ur ccekk fellas. Wid isxesoen iman nnsen, ur ppamnen
IneS i ized$en deg iv, deg wass. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ini: "day ara sau$ bab, war Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan? Neppa Icceccay ur t cceccayen". Ini: "nek pwamoe$ d ad ili$ d amenzu ara ianzen. Ur ppilit seg imcurak
Ini: "nek ugade$, ma aaua$ Mass iw, aaaqeb n wass ameqwoaean
Win imenaan segs, assen, ni$ Ieun fellas. Wagi d rrebe n uuee
Ma Isaadda Oebbi fellak cedda, ur p itekkes yiwen, siwa Neppa. Ma Isrebe ik, Neppa Izmer i yal cci
D Neppa ay d Aqehhao, sennig imdanen iS; d Neppa ay d Bab n uuwab, i Ieoan

Ini: "anda p ccada sennig akw tiyav"? Ini: "Oebbi d Anagi gari yidwen. Iweeea yi d Leqwoan agi, iwakken a kwen nabi$ yis, kunwi akked wid u$uo ibbwev. Day, kunwi, war ccekk, a pcehhdem ar, ar tama n Oebbi, llan ioebbiten nniven"? Ini: "ur cehhde$"! Ini: "Neppa d Oebbi, siwa Yiwen. Nek, rri$ akin ayen tepcarakem
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, ssnen p, akken ssnen arraw nnsen. Wid isxesoen iman nnsen, ihi, ur ppamnen
Anwa idensen sennig win d igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ iskaddben issekniyen iS? Ih, ur rebeen imednas
Ass ideg ara ten Nefser meooa, sinna a Nini i wid icurken: "anda ten icriken nnwen, i la taabdem
Deg uhewwel nnsen, siwa ma nnan d: "s Oebbi, Mass nne$, ur nelli d imcurak
Wali amek skaddben $ef yiman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen la d snulfuyen

Garasen wid i k issemeasen. Nerra aeurrim $ef ulawen nnsen, iwakken ur t fehmen. Tiaeeegt deg imeeeu$en nnsen. Ma walan yal assekni, ur ppamnen yis. Alamma, ma usan d $uoek, a k namren, ad ak inin wid ijehlen: ayagi siwa tiekayin imezwura
Siixxioen segs, iieooifen segs. Ay squccun siwa iman nnsen, ur faqen
Lemmer a ten twaliv, mara bedden ar tmes, a d inin: a ssexv nne$! Awi $ irran, ur neskiddib issekniyen n Mass nne$! A nili si lmumnin
Xaii! Iban asen d wayen teffren, zik. Lemmer a d kren, ad u$alen ar wayen i sen ipwagedlen. Nitni, s tidep, d ikeddaben
U qqaoen: "siwa tameddurt n ddunit i illan. Nekwni, ur fella$ tanekra
Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden ar Mass nnsen, ad Yini: "ni$ ayagi s tidep"? A d inin: "ih, s Mass nne$"! Ad Yini: "ihi jeoobet aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen tejhilem

Ni$ xesoen wid iskaddben timlilit akked oOebbi. Alamma, ma iusa ten id yimir, deqzalla, a d inin: "a yamxix nne$, $ef wayen ideg nestehza"! Nitni ad bibben tiaakkwumin nnsen $ef izugar nnsen. I icmet wayen bubben
Tameddurt n ddunit d urar kan akked lhawiyya. Axxam aneggaru, war ccekk, yif ip i wid ipeezziben. Day ur tepmeyyizem ara
Ni$ Neeoa i$webben ik, s tidep, wayen qqaoen. Ihi, nitni ur k skiddiben. Maca imednas veggoen issekniyen n Oebbi
Ni$ skaddben imazanen uqbel ik. Ueboen $ef wayen i ten skaddben, akked wayen i ten meeenen, armi i ten id iusa usellek nne£. Ur illi ubeddel i wawalen n Oebbi. Ni$ usan k id, kra isallen imazanen
Ma eeay fellak uwexxeo nnsen, ma tzemoev a tessarmev aderbuz di tmurt, ne$ sellum s igenni, ad asen d tawiv assekni. Ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi, a ten Issemlil ar nnhaya. Ur ppili seg wid ur nessin
Siwa wid isellen, ara d ijawben. Lmegtin a ten id Issker Oebbi, sinna, $uoeS tu$alin nnsen
Qqaoen: "acimi ur as d irs ara ussekni s$uo Mass is"? Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer a d Issers assekni", maca tegwti degsen ur eoin
Ur illi lweec di tmurt, ne$ ufrux ippafgen s wafriwen is, ur nelli d leoyus am kunwi. Ur Nestehza, di Tezmamt, $ef wacemma. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, ad pwafessren
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, aaegen, gugmen, di tillas. Win i S ihwan i Oebbi, a t Itlef. Win i S ihwan, a t Iawi d ubrid uwqim
Ini: "twalam ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb n Oebbi, ne$ ma iusa kwen id yimir, day ar war Oebbi ara tnaaoem, ma tessawalem tidep
Xaii! £uoeS ara tnujem. Ad Issiferr ayen i$ef tnujem $uoeS, ma ihwa yaS, a ppeppum ayen tcurkem
Ni$ Nuzen ed ar leoyus, uqbel ik. Nesaadda fellasen tilufa, ccqa, amar ad eiwten
A lemmer eawten, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£. Maca, qehoen wulawen nnsen. Cciian Icebbee asen ayen xeddmen
Mi ppun ayen i sen d smmektin, Nelli yasen tibbura n yal cci, armi, mi feoeen s wayen i sen ippunefken, Newwet iten, deqzalla. D$a qevaen layas
Pwakksen wid id igwran seg ugdud idensen. Ccekoan i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ini: "twalam, ma Iddem awen Oebbi timesliwt nnwen, akked ieoi nnwen; ma Isle$ ulawen nnwen; anwa oebbi, war Oebbi, ar awen ten id iawin"? Wali amek Nessefham issekniyen, u nitni, sinna, zzin akin
Ini: "acu twalam, ma iusa kwen id uaaqeb n Oebbi, deqzalla, ne$ ainani? Day ara Ine$, siwa agdud imednas
Ur d Nuzen imazanen, siwa i ubecceo, d unabi. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, a ten ieaz uaaqeb, ilmend n wayen be$wven

Ini: "ur awen qqare$ sai$ igerrujen n Oebbi, ur ssine$ tabavnit; ur awen qqare$: nek, d lmelk. Nek, teddu$ kan akked wayen iyi d ippuweeean". Ini: "day iaadel uder$al d win ipwalin? Day ur d tepmeyyizem ara
Nabi yis wid iugaden ad pwafessren ar Mass nnsen. Ur sain bab, war Neppa, ne$ amcafaa. Amar ad eezzben
Ur ppara wid ipnujun $uo Mass nnsen, tauebeit, tameddit, pnadin udem iS. Ur fellak a ten teasbev deg wacemma, ur fellasen a k easben, deg wacemma. Ma terriv ten, ihi, a ppiliv seg imednas
Akka ay Nhewwel kra s wiyav, iwakken a d inin: "day d wigi i I$at Oebbi, garane$"? Day ur Issin ara Oebbi, sennig akw, wid isnemmiren

Ma usan k id wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, ini: "tifrat fellawen"! Mass nnwen Iura, i iman iS, aeunu. Ihi, i win, segwen, ixedmen tucmip, ur iaammed, sin akin, isteooaa, u ixdem ayen ilhan, Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen, iwakken a d iban ubrid ibe$wviyen
Ini: "nek, ippugdel iyi ad aabde$ wid u$uo la tepnujum, war Oebbi". Ini: "ur teddu$ d lemcihwat nnwen, mulac ad nnetlafe$, ur ppili$ seg wid ipwanhan
Ini: "nek, iife$ deg ubeggen n Mass iw. Teskaddbem t. Ur illi $uoi wayen u$uo tearem. Ih, aeuddu $eo Oebbi kan. Issawal tidep. Neppa Yif akw wid issenqaden
Ini: "lemmer illi $uoi wayen u$uo tearem, yili iuao lameo, gari yidwen". Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen imednas
£uoeS tisura n tbavnit. Siwa Neppa itent Issnen. Ieoa i illan di lberr, di yill. Ur i$elli ifer siwa ma Ieoa t. Akken aaqqa di tillas n tmurt, tizzegzewt, ta$eot, akw di tezmamt ipbegginen
D Neppa i wen ippaddamen leowae deg iv. Ieoa ay txeddmem, deg wass. Sinna, Ippara kwen id degs, iwakken ad ivou lajel ipwassnen. Sinna, $uoeS tu$alin nnwen, sinna, a kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen txeddmem
D Neppa ay d Aqehhao sennig imdanen iS. Ippazen ed $uowen imearaben, alamma, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen, ad ddmen ooue is, imceggaen nne£. Nitni ur stehzayen
Sinna, ad u$alen ar Oebbi, Bab nnsen n tidep. Aeuddu, day macci d ayla S? Neppa Yif akw akken Ip$awal ar uqeiii
Ini: "anwa ara kwen Isellken si tillas n lberr d yill, u$uo tnujem s ueiwet akked tugwdi"? "Ma Isellek a$ si tagi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Ini: "Oebbi Isellek ikwen segs, akw si yal lhemm, sinna, kunwi la tepcarakem
Ini: "Neppa, Izmer ad awen d Iazen aaaqeb sennig wen, ne$ seddaw ivaoen nnwen. Ne$ a kwen Issemfaoaq, kra segwen ad jeooben leqheo n wiyav". Wali amek id Nemmal issekniyen, amar ad meeuen
Iskaddeb it ugdud ik, u neppa d tidep. Ini: "ur awen lli$ d awkil
Yal asali s lweqt is. A ppu$alem a ppeeoem
Ma twalav wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nne£, eoo iten, alamma bedlen anamer. Ma iseppu k Cciian, mi d temmektiv, ur p$imi d ugdud imednas
Ur isefk ara i wid ipeezziben, a ten easben deg wacemma. Maca d asmekti, amar ad eezzben

Eoo wid irran ddin nnsen d urar, d aqesseo. T$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Mmekti d yis, ard a ipwaiief umdan $ef wayen ikseb. Ur isai, war Oebbi, bab ne$ amcafaa. Yal le$oama ur tepwaqbal segs. Widak d wid ipwaifen $ef wayen kesben. I nitni tissit io$an, aaaqeb aqeoean, ilmend n wayen la jehlen

Ini: "day a naao, war Oebbi, ayen ur a$ neneffaa, ur a$ neiiuoou? U a nu$al a nwexxeo, deffir nnhaya n Oebbi, am win $ewwan ccwaien di tmurt, u ippueeyyeo". Pnecciden t imeddukwal ar nnhaya: "yya $uone$"! Ini: "d nnhaya n Oebbi, s tidep, ay d nnhaya. Nepwameo a nanez i Mass imavalen
eealet, eezzbet aS. £uoeS, Neppa, ara tepwafessrem
D Neppa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ass ideg ara Yini: "ili"! Ad yili. Awal iS d tidep. IneS tagelda. Ass uuuvu n lbuq, Ieoa i iffren d wayen ivehoen. Neppa d Bab n uuwab, i Ieoan
Mi inna Iboahim i baba s, Azao: "day a pperrev tiaancuoin d ioebbiten? Nek wala$ k, kecc akked ugdud ik, di ttelfan n uuee
Akka, Nessken i Iboahim, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan, iwakken ad yili seg wid itebbten
Mi t i$umm yiv, iwala itri, inna: "wagi d Mass iw". Mi ixsi, inna: "ur eemle$ ara wid ixessin
Mi iwala iuli d waggur n tziri, inna: "wagi d Mass iw". Mi i$ab, inna: "ma ur iyi Inha ara Mass iw, ad ili$, war ccekk, seg ugdud im$eooqen
Mi iwala iiij ineqqeo ed, inna: "wagi d Mass iw, wagi meqqweo kteo". Mi i$li, inna: "a yagdud iw! Nek rri$ akkin ayen tepcarakem
Nek zzi$ udem iw ar Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, male$ ar tidep. Ur lli$, nek, seg imcurak
Ixuuem it ugdud is, inna: "day ad iyi txaumem $ef Oebbi? Ni$ Inha yi; ur ugade$ ayen i S tcurkem, siwa ma illa wayen i S ihwan i Mass iw. Tussna n Mass iw tezdi yal cci, day ur d tesmektayem ara
Amek ara ugade$ ayen tepcarakem, ur tugadem mi kunwi tepcarakem, i Oebbi, ayen iwumi ur d Issers adabu fellawen? Anwa, ger sin ikabaran, i iklalen laman, maday tessnem
Wid iumnen, ur sselsen ddens i liman nnsen, widak ad ilin di laman, u nitni pwanhan
D wagi ay d awal nne£. Nefka yas t i Iboahim, mgal agdud is. Nessalay tiseddaoin, win i£ £ ihwan. Ih, Mass ik d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Nefka yas Iseaq akked Yaaqub. I sin, Nenha ten. Nenha, zik, Nue akw, ger tarwa s, Dawed, Sliman, Yub, Yusef, Musa, Haoun, - Akka ay Nepkafi iaaoviyen
Zakarya, Yeeya, Aisa, Ilyas, - akw seg iaaoviyen
Ismaail, Lyasaa, Yunes, Lui, - akw Nesmenyaf iten $ef imavalen
akw seg ibabaten nnsen, si tarwa nnsen, akked watmaten nnsen. Nefren iten, u Nebbwi ten d ubrid uwqim
Tagi d nnhaya n Oebbi. Inehhu yis win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Lemmer curken, war ccekk, ad asen imeu wayen xeddmen
D wigi iwumi d Nebbwi Tazmamt, uuwab, akked lambiyya. Ma jehlen widak yis, ihi, Nekwni Nwekkel ip i ugdud ur njehhel yis
Wigi d wid Inha Oebbi. Ddu d nnhaya nnsen. Ini: "ur awen suture$, fellas, taqdiat. Neppa d asmekti kan i imavalen

Ur qudoen Oebbi azal n lqedo iS, mi qqaoen: "ur d Issers Oebbi acemma ar umdan". Ini: "anwa id Issersen Tazmamt, id ibbwi Musa, d tafat u d nnhaya i medden? Tepparam p di lkwa$ev i tesskanem. Aias ay teppeffrem. Tlemdem ayen ur tessinem, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen". Ini: "D Oebbi". Sinna, anef asen ad uraren s nnmara nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id teoqa, a ptebbet ayen ip id izwaren, a ppendeo tayimmap n temdinin akked wayen i s d izzin. Wid iumnen s laxeot, umnen yis. Nitni bedden i teilla nnsen

Anwa idensen sennig win d igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi? Ne$ inna: "ppuweeea$ d", ur as d ippuweeea wacemma? U win innan: "a d sserse$ am wayen id Issers Oebbi"? Lemmer a pwaliv imednas, di maylellif n tmeppant, u lmalayek elent ed ifassen nnsent: "ssuff$et ed tiowiein nnwen. Assa, a ppeppuqeiiim s uaaqeb isneecamen, ilmend n wayen teqqaoem $ef Oebbi, ur d tidep. U tellam tessem$waoem iman nnwen, $ef issekniyen iS

Ni$ tusam a£ d, d ifoiden, akken ikwen Nexleq abrid amezwaru. Teooam deffir wen, ayen i wen Nefka. Ur Nwala, $uowen, imcafaen nnwen, wid i taabdem, nitni, d icriken nnwen. Ni$ temfaoaqem, u ooan kwen wid la taabdem
Oebbi, s tidep, Ifeooec aaqqa, i$es. Issuffu$ ed amuddir si lmegget. Issuffu$ ed lmegget seg umuddir. Akka ay d Oebbi. Acimi tugim
Issenkar tafrara. Irra iv i ureyyee, iiij d waggur i leesab. D wagi ay d aseyyi n Uzmir, Amusnaw
D Neppa i wen Irran itran, ad awen mlen abrid, di tillas n lberr akked yill. Ni$ Nemmal issekniyen i ugdud issnen
D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiman afoid, sinna: amkan, tarusi. Ni$ Nemmal issekniyen i ugdud ifehhmen

D Neppa id Isrusun aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen yal im$an. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tizzegzewt. Nessuffu$ ed yissen iaaqqayen mbabben, iguza n ppmeo id ipuubbun si tezdayin, leonanat n tfeooant, uzemmur, n oemman, ppemcabin ne$ ur ppemcabin. Walit ppemoa nnsen mi d teffe$ tebbwa. Ih, deg waya, war ccekk, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Rran i Oebbi, leonun d icriken, u Ixelq iten. Snulfan aS d arrac, tullas, ur eoin. Gedha s yiS! Ay Aalay sennig wayen d qqaoen
Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, amek ara Isau mmi S, ur Isai tameddakwelt? U Ixleq yal cci, u Neppa, yal cci, Issen it
D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Ixleq yal cci, ihi aabdet eP. Neppa d Awkil n yal cci
Ur T tepsami tmu$li. Neppa Ipsami tamu$li. Neppa d Laiif, i Izoan
Ni$ iusa kwen id ara twalim, s$uo Mass nnwen. Win iwalan, i iman is; win idre$len, mgal is. Ur lli$ nek d ameareb nnwen
Akka ay Nessefham issekniyen, iwakken ad inin: "tlemdev", iwakken a t Nbeggen i ugdud issnen
Ddu d wayen ik ed ippuweeean, s$uo Mass ik; ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Eoo imcurak
Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur curken. Ur k Nerra d ameareb nnsen, ur telliv d awkil nnsen
Ur naalet wid u$uo la pnujun, war Oebbi. Axaieo ad naalen Oebbi, s lbe$wv, war tamusni. Akka ay Ncebbee igiten is i yal lois. Sinna, ar Mass nnsen, tu$alin nnsen; a ten Ixebbeo $ef wayen xeddmen
Ggulen s Oebbi, tagalit meqqwoen, ar ma iusa ten id ussekni, ar ad amnen yis. Ini: "issekniyen ar Oebbi kan". Acu i kwen irran teussem ar, xas ma iusa ten id, ur ppamnen
A Neppi ulawen nnsen, d yieoi nnsen, akken ur uminen yis abrid amezwaru. A ten Neoo di lbe$wv nnsen, d ider$alen
Xas Nekwni Nessers asen d lmalayek, u mmeslayen asen d lmeggtin, u Nefser asen d, yal cci, zdat sen, ur ppamnen, siwa ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi. Maca, aias degsen ur ssinen
Akka ay Nerra, i yal nnbi, acengu. Ccwaien, seg imdanen akw si leonun, ppemweeein garasen awal uziyn i u$uoou. Lemmer i S ihwi, i Mass ik, ur p xeddmen. Ihi, eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen
iwakken ad mmalen $uoes ulawen n wid ur numin s laxeot, a t oavin, ad gemren ayen zeraen
Day b$i$ ameaddi, war Oebbi? D Neppa i wen d Issersen Tazmamt, s ussefhem. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, eoan, ar neppat, ters ed s$uo Mass ik, s tidep. Ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun
Awal n Mass ik ibbwev, s tidep akked lmizan. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma tu$ev awal i tegwti n wid illan di tmurt, a k telfen seg ubrid n Oebbi. Teddun kan d wayen nwan. Nitni snulfuyen d kan
Ih, Mass ik Issen sennig akw, anwi innetlafen seg ubrid iS. Neppa Issen sennig akw, anwi ipwanhan
Eccet ayen i$ef d immekti isem n Oebbi, ma tumnem s issekniyen iS

Acu ikwen iu$en, ur teppeppem ara seg wayen i$ef d immekti isem n Oebbi? Ni$ Issfehm awen ayen i wen Igdel, siwa ma ipwaeeppem fellawen. Ih, aias ay tellifen, s zzhu nnsen, war tussna. Ni$ Mass ik Iugar akw akken Issen wid izegren tilas
Ekkset abekkav uvhio akked uffir. Ih, wid ibbwin abekkav, ad ppuqeiiin $ef wayen xeddmen
Ur teppet ayen i$ef ur d immekti ara, isem n Oebbi. Ih, ayagi d ixmio. Ih, ccwaien pweeein i imeddukwal nnsen, a kwen namren. Ma tu$em asen awal, kunwi, s tidep, tcurkem
Ma win illan d lmegget, Nessider it id, Nga yas tafat, iteddu yis ger medden, day d amedya s, win illan di tillas, ur izmir ad iffe$ segsent. Akka, ippucebbee i ijehliyen, wayen xeddmen
Akka ay Nerra, ad ppandin di yal tamdint, ibe$wviyen is, uqsieen mavi. Ppandin kan i iman nnsen, ur faqen

Ma iusa ten id ussekni, ad inin: "ur neppamen, alamma iusa ya$ d ayen id iusan ar imazanen n Oebbi". Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen, anida ara Ifk taboap iS. Ad ioxisen, ar Oebbi, wid ibe$wven. Fellasen aaaqeb uqsie, ilmend n wayen ppandin
Win Ib$a Oebbi a t Inhu, ad illi idmaren is ar wannuz. Win Ib$a a t Itlef, ad Irr idmaren is deyqen, teeyyoen, amzun ippaaoav ad iali s igenni. Akka i Ippara Oebbi axerwaa i wid ur numin
Wagi d abrid uwqim n Mass ik. Ni$ Nessefham issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
I nitni, axxam n tifrat ar Mass nnsen. Neppa d Bab nnsen, $ef wayen xeddmen

Ass ideg ara ten Ifser meooa: "a yagraw n leonun, ni$ tcerraem deg imdanen"? A d inin imawlan nnsen, seg imdanen: "a Mass nne$! Kra segne$ $elten si kra, Nebbwev ar lajel nne$, i $ Terriv". Inna: "d times ay d tanezdu$t nnwen, ad degs twekkoem, siwa ma ur aS ihwi i Oebbi". Ih, Mass ik d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Akka ay Neppara kra imednas d iebiben n kra, ilmend n wayen keppben

A yagraw n leonun d yimdanen, day ur kwen id usan ara imazanen segwen? Mmalen awen issekniyen iW, nedoen kwen $ef temlilit n wass nnwen agi". Nnan d: "ncehhed $ef yiman nne$". T$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Cehhden $ef yiman nnsen ar nitni, s tidep, llan d ijehliyen
Akka, acku Mass ik ur Isquccu tamdint, s ddens, ma llan imezda$ is d i$wefliyen
I yal yiwen, tiseddarin seg wayen ixdem. Ur I$effel Mass ik $ef wayen xeddmen
Mass ik d Asaay, d Bab ueunu. Ma ihwa yaS a kwen Ikkes, a d Inuef, deffir wen, ayen i S ihwan, akken ikwen id Ixleq si tarwa n ugdud nniven
Ih, ayen i wen ippuaahden, a d ias, war ccekk. Ur tezmirem, kunwi, a ppesfunngem
Ini: "a yagdud iw! Xedmet akken tewaam, nek ad xedme$. Deqqal a ppeeoem iwumi ara telhu taggara n Uxxam". S tidep, ur rebeen imednas

Gan aS i Oebbi amur, seg wayen id Ifka n l$ella, akked lmal. Nnan: "wagi i Oebbi –- di tikta nnsen -, wagi i icriken nne$". Ayen gan i icriken nnsen, ur ippawev ar Oebbi. Ayen gan i Oebbi, neppa, ad yawev ar icriken nnsen. I icmet wayen id peuddun
Akka ay cebbeen icriken nnsen, i waias n yimcurak, timen$iwt n tarwa nnsen, iwakken a ten squccen, u ad irwi ddin nnsen, fellasen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur p xeddmen. Eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen

Nnan: "lmal akked l$ella yagi ppugedlen, ur ten itepp, siwa win i $ ihwan". S tikta nnsen. Lmal iwumi gedlen iarar nnsen, lmal iwumi ur d ppadren fellasen, isem n Oebbi. D asnulfu mgal iS. A ten Iqeiii $ef wayen d snulfuyen
Qqaoen: "ayen illan deg iaabbav n lmal agi, i ddker nne$ kan, ipwagdel i tlawin nne$". Ma ilul ed immut, ad mlilen $uoes. A ten Iqeiii $ef wayen d qqaoen. Neppa, s tidep, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ xesoen wid in$an arraw nnsen. D tiderwect, war tussna. Gedlen ayen i s iten I$at Oebbi, snulfan d mgal Oebbi. Ni$ nnetlafen, ur pwanhan

D Neppa id Ixelqen leonanat s iaricen, ne$ war iaricen, tizdayin, zerriaa n yal uuenf, i wucci; azemmur akked rreman ippemcabin, ne$ ur neppemcabi. Eccet si ppemoa nnsen, ma fkan d, efket leeqq is, ass u$ellet nnsen. Ur ssugutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid ipeawalen
Si lmal, aggway d wussu. Eccet seg wayen ikwen Ioeeq Oebbi. Ur teddut d iberdan n Cciian. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu nnwen n uuee
Iamt tyugiwin, snat u$welmi, snat umaiz. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iaabbav n snat n nnta? Xebboet iyi d, s tussna, ma tessawalem tidep

Seg ile$wman, snat, seg ubeqoi, snat. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iaabbav n snat n nnta, ne$ tellam d inagan mi kwen id Iweuua Oebbi $ef waya"? Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, iwakken ad itlef imdanen, ur issin. Ih, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas

Ini: "ur ufi$ ipwagdel a t icc yiwen, deg wayen iyi d ippuweeean, siwa ma illa d loifa, ne$ d idim immaren, ne$ d aksum n yilef - wagi, war ccekk, d lewsex -, ne$ ieegga s d$wel i war Oebbi. Win i$ef ippueeppem, ur ib$i, ur ib$wiv, Mass ik, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

I wudayen, Negdel ayen akw isaan acaren, seg ubeqoi akked u$welmi, Negdel asen tassemt nnsen, siwa tin n iarar nnsen, iaabbav, akked wayen ipwaxelven akked i$san. Akka ay ten Nepkafi, ilmend n iieoo nnsen. Nekwni, war ccekk, d At Tidep
Ma skaddben k, ini: "Mass nnwen d Bab ueunu iwsaan, ur ipwexxio ssexv iS, af ugdud ibe$wviyen

Ad inin imcurak: "lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, nekwni akked imezwura nne$, ur ncurek, ur negdel acemma". Akka ay skaddben imezwura nnsen, armi jeooben ssexv nne£. Ini: "day tesaam tussna ar a$ d tesseknem? Teppeddum kan d nnwaya, kunwi tesnulfuyem d kan
Ini: "n Oebbi timenna tunuiein. Lemmer i S ihwi, yili Inha kwen akw

Ini: "awit ed inagan nnwen, ara icehhden ar Oebbi Igdel ayagi". Ma cehhden, ur cehhed yidsen. Ur teddu d lhawiyya n wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked wid ur numin s laxeot, u pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen

Ini: "yyaw, ad ini$. I wen Igdel Mass nnwen: ur aS tepcarakem acemma; elhut ar imawlan nnwen; ur neqqet tarwa nnwen, di tigullelt - d Nekwni ara kwen Ioeeqen yidsen -, ur ppaeet ar laao, d uvhio ne$ d uffir; ur neqqet amdan, d ayen Igdel Oebbi, siwa ma s leeqq". Ar waya i kwen Iweuua, amar a pfehmem

Ur pqeooibet s ayla ugujil, siwa s wayen ilhan, alamma immeetel. Weznet, ktilet s lewqama. Ur Nepkellif amdan siwa ar wayen iwumi izmer. Ma thedoem d, weznet, xas ma $eo llzem nnwen. Qadoet lemaahda n Oebbi. Iweuua kwen $ef waya, amar a d temmektim
D wagi ay d abrid iW uwqim, ddut degs. Ur teddut d iberdan ara kwen isiixoen seg ubrid iS. Iweuua kwen $ef waya, amar a peezzbem
Sinna, Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Tewqem i wid imaanen, tfeuuel yal cci, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Amar ad amnen s timlilit n Mass nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id, teoqa. Ihi, ddut yides, eezzbet, amar fellawen aeunu
Ur d teqqaoem ara: "ters ed kan Tezmamt $eo sin leoyus, uqbel nne$, ur neeoi d acu sselmaden

Ne$ a d tinim: "lemmer id ters Tazmamt $uone$, yili nif iten akken nepwanha". Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen, s$uo Mass nnwen, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Anwa idensen sennig win iskaddben issekniyen n Oebbi, u iooa iten? A Nqeiii wid iooan issekniyen nne£, s yir aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen la ppaooan

D acu poaoun, siwa ma ten id asent lmalayek, ne$ a d Ias Mass ik, ne$ a d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik? Ass ideg ara d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik, ur infaa umdan liman is, ma, iu$ leal, ur iumin ara, ne$ ur iksib lxio, di liman is. Ini: "gganit, nekwni, ih, la nepgani
Ih, wid ibvan ddin nnsen, u gan ikabaren, ur tepkkiv yidsen deg wacemma. Lameo nnsen ar Oebbi kan, sinna, a ten Ixebbeo $ef wayen xeddmen
Win id iusan s yise$, ines mraw i t icban; win id iusan s tucmip, ad ippuqeiii s tin kan i p icban; nitni ur pwadensen
Ini: "nek, Inha iyi Mass iw, ar ubrid uwqim, d ddin n ddwam, win n Iboahim, i imalen ar tidep, ur nelli seg imcurak
Ini: "ih, taeallit iw, iseflan iw, tudert iw, tameppant iw, i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ur aS illi ucarek. Pwamoe$ d s waya: nek d amdua amenzu

Ini: "day b$i$ mass, war Oebbi? U Neppa d Mass n yal cci". Ur ikesseb yal yiman, siwa mgal is. Ur ipbibbi win ibubben taakkwemt n wayev. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen, tu$alin nnwen. Sinna, a kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen tellam temgaradem
D Neppa i kwen Irran d igensas di tmurt. Irra, kra segwen, tiseddaoin sennig wiyav, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb $ef wayen i wen Ifka. Ih, Mass ik Ip$awal deg uaaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
